SELECT ir.id AS ir_id, ir.fechainiciorenta AS ir_fechainiciorenta , ir.fechafinrenta AS ir_fechafinrenta,
i.id AS i_id, i.nombre AS i_nombre, i.descripcion AS i_descripcion, i.fechalanzamiento AS i_fechalanzamiento, i.tarifaxdia AS i_tarifaxdia, i.formatorenta AS i_formatorenta, i.genero AS i_genero,
ti.id AS ti_id , ti.descripcion AS ti_descripcion
FROM VI_CLIENTES AS c INNER JOIN VI_ITEMRENTADO AS ir ON c.documento=ir.CLIENTES_documento INNER JOIN VI_ITEMS AS i ON ir.ITEMS_id=i.id INNER JOIN VI_TIPOITEM AS ti ON i.TIPOITEM_id=ti.id;

SELECT ir.id AS ir_id, ir.fechainiciorenta AS ir_fechainiciorenta , ir.fechafinrenta AS ir_fechafinrenta,
i.id AS i_id, i.nombre AS i_nombre, i.descripcion AS i_descripcion, i.fechalanzamiento AS i_fechalanzamiento, i.tarifaxdia AS i_tarifaxdia, i.formatorenta AS i_formatorenta, i.genero AS i_genero,
ti.id AS ti_id , ti.descripcion AS ti_descripcion
FROM VI_CLIENTES AS c INNER JOIN VI_ITEMRENTADO AS ir ON c.documento=ir.CLIENTES_documento INNER JOIN VI_ITEMS AS i ON ir.ITEMS_id=i.id INNER JOIN VI_TIPOITEM AS ti ON i.TIPOITEM_id=ti.id WHERE #{idcli} = c.documento;

SELECT DISTINCT ir.id AS ir_id, ir.fechainiciorenta AS ir_fechainiciorenta , ir.fechafinrenta AS ir_fechafinrenta,
i.id AS i_id, i.nombre AS i_nombre, i.descripcion AS i_descripcion, i.fechalanzamiento AS i_fechalanzamiento, i.tarifaxdia AS i_tarifaxdia, i.formatorenta AS i_formatorenta, i.genero AS i_genero,
ti.id AS ti_id , ti.descripcion AS ti_descripcion
FROM VI_ITEMRENTADO AS ir INNER JOIN VI_ITEMS AS i ON ir.ITEMS_id=i.id INNER JOIN VI_TIPOITEM AS ti ON i.TIPOITEM_id=ti.id WHERE #{idItem} = ir.ITEMS_id LIMIT 1;
